miscellaneous

Class NumFourRows

  • java.lang.Object
    • c4.ConnectFour
      • miscellaneous.NumFourRows

  • public class NumFourRows
extends ConnectFour
    Author:
    Markus Thill With this little class it is possible to calculate the number of four-rows which can be put through every single field.
